original_title: The Parable of the Leaf Blower
overview: A slow, thoughtful and meditative animation with no spoken word by the internationally renowned sculptor Rachel Ara. The film uses leaves as a metaphor for the cycles and rhythms of life. The rake and/or leaf blower symbolise our chosen approach. The film asks us to slow down. It is a time to think for ourselves and reflect on womenâ€™s roles, the environment and our approach to life
title: The Parable of the Leaf Blower
